about_the_game:
The demo version includes:
- Building, material gathering and combat mechanics;
- Walking and camera movement mechanics;
- Various buildings, e.g.: tavern, city hall, shaman's hut;
- 2 missions, based on searching, building and fighting;
- “skirmish” game mode, which consists of building, enlarging the settlement and fighting monsters;
- A system of appearing monsters depending on the location of the tombstone

The full version of the game will depend on your feedback, while we are working on the final version of the game we will focus our attention on your comments on the demo game!

Before the missionaries came to the Slavic lands to start writing down the known history, there was the Age of Mythos:


Forests, valleys and fields are full of creatures from Slavic beliefs. Even though they may look like monsters, you don't have to fight them all. Make proper offerings to them and you will gain powerful allies.


Give your workers a roof over their heads and a good supper and they will build a thriving settlement for you. Do not disappoint your subjects, because dissatisfied people may leave you.


A long spear and a sharp sword will always be useful - your settlement is threatened by monsters, other tribes, Vikings or even demons from distant lands.


Follow Slavic traditions to earn points that you may spend on special blessings from the gods - the warlike Perun, the generous Mokosh and the mysterious Veles.

short_description: Mythos Slavic Builder is a combination of classic real-time strategy games and it's based on Slavic mythology. Grow your settlement, build up the economy, army and explore maps guarded by mythical creatures & other clans.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
